Is Saitou a feminist?

Good question.

1) he believes in old school chivalry I think...a bit protective and a
perfect gentleman

2) HOWEVER behind Tokio's back he acknowledges her to be a capable woman

so no, not a feminist in a modern sense however he sensitive of the
feelings women have for men otherwise why did he ask Kenshin if
Kenshin had said goodbye to Kaoru?  (in manga...the scene at night
after Kenshin gives Kaoru the goodbye hug).
